Querys.query: insert into vaccine_details(batch_number, vaccine_name, receive_date, country, expire_date, quantity) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
select vaccineNo, batch_number, vaccine_name, receive_date, country, expire_date, quantity from vaccine_details
select vaccineNo, batch_number, vaccine_name, receive_date, country, expire_date, quantity from vaccine_details where vaccineNo = ?
update vaccine_details as g set g.batch_number = ?, g.vaccine_name = ?, g.receive_date = ?, g.country = ?, g.expire_date = ?, g.quantity = ? where g.vaccineNo = ?
select vaccineName, COUNT(*) as count from vaccine_details group by vaccineName
